scripts.dev:d1: npm run db:migrate:local && wrangler pages dev dist --d1=amc-material-db --local --ip 0.0.0.0 --port 3000
scripts.dev:pm2: npm run db:migrate:local && pm2 start ecosystem.config.cjs
scripts.build: vite build && mkdir -p dist/static && cp -r public/static/* dist/static/ && cp public/_headers dist/
scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name amc-material-system
scripts.git:init: git init && git add . && git commit -m 'Initial commit'
